summary: The TypeScript SDK's nyc-test-coverage package depends on unmaintained istanbul-instrumenter-loader, causing npm audit to report multiple security vulnerabilities including prototype pollution (CVE in ajv) and ReDoS issues in glob-parent.
userImpact: Users installing the SDK encounter multiple npm audit warnings and security vulnerabilities, including moderate and high-severity issues that need force-fixing.
rootCause: The istanbul-instrumenter-loader dependency is archived and no longer maintained, pulling in outdated transitive dependencies with known security vulnerabilities.
proposedFix: Replace istanbul-instrumenter-loader with a maintained alternative or inline the functionality (noted as just a few lines of code).
resolutionDetails: The dependency was likely replaced or removed in subsequent releases.
keyQuote: Looks like that lib is just a few lines: https://github.com/webpack-contrib/istanbul-instrumenter-loader/blob/master/src/index.js
